alert.note: Alert for Essex; Orleans (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 04 at 4:16AM EST until December 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches for a storm total of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...In New York, Western Clinton County. In Vermont, Orleans and Essex Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated to scattered power outages are ongoing, and may increase in extent over the next few hours with some of the additional snow accumulations.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
